text: The future royal sisters - in - law are apparently pretty different... or at least, that ’ s what Kate Middleton and Meghan Markle ’ s handwriting suggest! Handwriting expert Jamie Mason Cohen studied samples of Meghan and Kate's writing, revealing stark differences in their personalities. Cohen told The Daily Express that the Duchess of Cambridge ’ s writing shows her to have strong control of her emotions, specifically her temper. Kate, 36, apparently also knows how to pick her battles. 86 PHOTOS Prince Harry and Meghan Markle together See Gallery Prince Harry and Meghan Markle together The Duke and Duchess of Sussex attend a Summer Party at the British Ambassador's residence at Glencairn House, during a visit to Dublin, Ireland.
